output: html_notebook

# Load libraries

```{r}
library('corrplot')
library('tidyverse')
```


# Load data and visualize the clusters

```{r}
userdata <- read.table("OSSStudy4.csv", header=T) # OSSstudy4.txt has mean mouse duration
df <- cbind(userdata[,1], scale(userdata[,2:54]))
colnames(df)[1] <- "ID" 
#png("subject-clusters-splitmouse.png")
h <- heatmap(df[,c(2:20,39:54)], scale="column")
```
# Create groups based on dendogram

```{r}
grp1 <- c(1,3,9,4,5)
grp2 <- c(10,2,6,8,7)
```


# Visualize just the dendogram

```{r}
plot(hclust(dist(t(df[,c(2:20,39:54)]))), xlab="Variables")
```

# Corrplot view
```{r}
cors <- cor.mtest(df[,c(2:20,39:54)], conf.level=0.95)
corrplot(cor(df[,c(2:20,39:54)]), p.mat=cors$p, order="hclust", addrec=6, sig.level=0.05, insig="blank")
```
